text: this is an Bernard reporting from Gaza a
huge bomb fell on a four-story house in
communist in the southern Gaza Strip it
killed 25 members of a family and one
Hamas militant where the house had been
was a huge crater piles of dirt around
where the neighbors had used bulldozers
to dig Alex bodies when we came around
the corner of the house we saw a small
girl who ran away and sat down on the
stoop and began to cry this was the
largest toll in a single bombing in the
conflict there were 19 children killed
in the strike Israel has not explained
the strike but it appears it was
targeting the Hamas militant but in Gaza
people are surprised at how many houses
have been targeted with people in them
they say that Israel in the past has
been able to kill Hamas leaders riding
in a car without killing the other
passengers and they're angry that so
many of these bombings seem to be taking
out entire houses and families and
that's driving new questions about
Israel's operation so now in Gaza and in
Israel people are waiting to see if the
ceasefire will come and it's a bigger
question it will resolve any of the
underlying issues that have driven Wars
like this every few years
[Music]
Oh
